000000.gua_ci:
THE RECEPTIVE brings about sublime success,
Furthering through the perseverance of a mare.
If the superior man undertakes something and tries to lead,
He goes astray;
But if he follows, he finds guidance.
It is favorable to find friends in the west and south,
To forego friends in the east and north.
Quiet perseverance brings good fortune.
000000.name: Responding
yao_ci:
Initial Six: When there is hoarfrost underfoot,
Solid ice is not far off.

Second Six: Straight, square, great.
Without purpose,
Yet nothing remains unfurthered.

Third Six: Hidden lines.
One is able to remain persevering.
If by chance you are in the service of a king,
Seek not works, but bring to completion.
Fourth Six: A tied-up sack. No blame, no praise.
Fifth Six: A yellow lower garment brings supreme good fortune.

Top Six: Dragons fight in the meadow.
Their blood is black and yellow.
000000.yong_ci: A yielding ruler comes forth. Good fortune.

000001.gua_ci:
RETURN. Success.
Going out and coming in without error.
Friends come without blame.
To and fro goes the way.
On the seventh day comes return.
It furthers one to have somewhere to go.
000001.name: Turning Back
yao_ci:
Initial Six: Return from a short distance.
No need for remorse.
Great good fortune.
Second Six: Quiet return. Good fortune.
Third Six: Repeated return. Danger. No blame.

Fourth Six: Walking in the midst of others,
One returns alone.
Fifth Six: Noblehearted return. No remorse.

Top Nine: Missing the return. Misfortune.
Misfortune from within and without.
If armies are set marching in this way,
One will in the end suffer a great defeat,
Disastrous for the ruler of the country.
For ten years
It will not be possible to attack again.

000010.gua_ci:
THE ARMY. The army needs perseverance
And a strong man.
Good fortune without blame.
An army is a mass that needs organization in order to become a fighting force.
000010.name: Multitude
yao_ci:
Initial Six: An army must set forth in proper order.
If the order is not good, misfortune threatens.

Second Six: In the midst of the army.
Good fortune. No blame.
The king bestows a triple decoration.

Third Six: Perchance the army carries corpses in the wagon.
Misfortune.
Fourth Six: The army retreats. No blame.

Fifth Nine: There is game in the field.
It furthers one to catch it.
Without blame.
Let the eldest lead the army.
The younger transports corpses;
Then perseverance brings misfortune.

Top Six: The great prince issues commands,
Founds states, vests families with fiefs.
Inferior people should not be employed.

000011.gua_ci:
APPROACH has supreme success.
Perseverance furthers.
When the eighth month comes,
. There will be misfortune.
000011.name: Approaching
yao_ci:
Initial Six: Joint approach.
Perseverance brings good fortune.

Second Six: Joint approach.
Good fortune.
Everything furthers.

Third Six: Comfortable approach.
Nothing that would further.
If one is induced to grieve over it,
One becomes free of blame.

Fourth Six: Complete approach.
No blame.

Fifth Nine: Wise approach.
This is right for a great prince.
Good fortune.

Top Nine: Great hearted approach.
Good-hearted approach.
Good fortune. No blame.

000100.gua_ci:
MODESTY creates success.
. The superior man carries things through.
000100.name: Humbleness
yao_ci:
Initial Six: A superior man modest about his modesty
May cross the great water.
Good fortune.
Second Six: Modesty that comes to expression. Perseverance brings good fortune.

Third Six: A superior man of modesty and merit
Carries things to conclusion.
Good fortune.

Fourth Nine: Nothing that would not further modesty
In movement.

Fifth Six: No boasting of wealth before one's neighbor.
It is favorable to attack with force.
Nothing that would not further.

Top Six: Modesty that comes to expression.
It is favorable to set armies marching
To chastise one's own city and one's country.

000101.gua_ci:
DARKENING OF THE LIGHT. In adversity
It furthers one to be persevering.
000101.name: Brilliance Injured
yao_ci:
Initial Six: Darkening of the light during flight.
He lowers his wings.

Second Six: Darkening of the light injures him in the left thigh.
He gives aid with the strength of a horse.
Good fortune.
Third Six: Darkening of the light during the hunt in the south.

Fourth Nine: He penetrates the left side of the belly.
One gets at the very heart of the darkening of the light.

Fifth Six: Darkening of the light as with Prince Chi.
Perseverance furthers.

Top Nine: Not light but darkness.
First he climbed up to heaven,

000110.gua_ci:
PUSHING UPWARD has supreme success.
One must see the great man.
Fear not.
Departure toward the south
Brings good fortune.
000110.name: Growing Upward
yao_ci:
Initial Six: Pushing upward that meets with confidence
Brings great good fortune.

Second Six: If one is sincere,
It furthers one to bring even a small offering.
Third Six: One pushes upward into an empty city.

Fourth Nine: The king offers him Mount Ch'i.
Good fortune. No blame.

Fifth Nine: Perseverance brings good fortune.
One pushes upward by steps.

Top Six: Pushing upward in darkness.
It furthers one

000111.gua_ci:
PEACE. The small departs,
The great approaches.
Good fortune. Success.
000111.name: Advance
yao_ci:
Initial Six: When ribbon grass is pulled up, the sod comes with it.
Each according to his kind.
Undertakings bring good fortune.

Second Six: Bearing with the uncultured in gentleness,
Fording the river with resolution,
Not neglecting what is distant,
Not regarding one's companions:

Third Six: No plain not followed by a slope.
No going not followed by a return.
He who remains persevering in danger
Is without blame.
Do not complain about this truth;
Enjoy the good fortune you still possess.

Fourth Nine: He flutters down, not boasting of his wealth,
Together with his neighbor,
Guileless and sincere.

Fifth Nine: The sovereign I
Gives his daughter in marriage.
And supreme good fortune.

Top Nine: The wall falls back into the moat.
Use no army now.
Make your commands known within your own town.
Perseverance brings humiliation.

001000.gua_ci:
ENTHUSIASM. It furthers one to install helpers
And to set armies marching.
001000.name: ENTHUSIASM
yao_ci:
Initial Six: Enthusiasm that expresses itself
Brings misfortune.

Second Six: Firm as a rock. Not a whole day.
Perseverance brings good fortune.

Third Nine: Enthusiasm that looks upward creates remorse.
Hesitation brings remorse.

Fourth Six: The source of enthusiasm.
He achieves great things.
Doubt not.
You gather friends around you
As a hair clasp gathers the hair.
Fifth Six: Persistently ill, and still does not die.

Top Six: Deluded enthusiasm.
But if after completion one changes,
There is no blame.

001001.gua_ci:
SHOCK brings success. Shock comes-oh, oh! Laughing words -ha, ha!
The shock terrifies for a hundred miles,
And he does not let fall the sacrificial spoon and chalice.
001001.name: Taking Action
yao_ci: Initial Six: Shock comes-oh, oh!

Second Six: Shock comes bringing danger.
A hundred thousand times
You lose your treasures
And must climb the nine hills.
Do not go in pursuit of them.
After seven days you will get them back again.

Third Nine: Shock comes and makes one distraught.
If shock spurs to action
One remains free of misfortune.
Fourth Six: Shock is mired.

Fifth Six: Shock goes hither and thither.
Danger.
However, nothing at all is lost.
Yet there are things to be done.

Top Nine: Shock brings ruin and terrified gazing around.
Going ahead brings misfortune.
If it has not yet touched one's own body
But has reached one's neighbor first,

001010.gua_ci:
DELIVERANCE. The southwest furthers.
If there is no longer anything where one has to go,
Return brings good fortune.
If there is still something where one has to go,
Hastening brings good fortune.
001010.name: Relief
yao_ci: Initial Six: Without blame.

Second Six: One kills three foxes in the field
And receives a yellow arrow.
Perseverance brings good fortune.

Third Nine: If a man carries a burden on his back
And nonetheless rides in a carriage,
He thereby encourages robbers to draw near.
Perseverance leads to humiliation.
Fourth Six: Deliver yourself from your great toe.

Fifth Nine: If only the superior man can deliver himself,
It brings good fortune.

Top Six: The prince shoots at a hawk on a high wall.
He kills it. Everything serves to further.

001011.gua_ci:
THE MARRYING MAIDEN.
Undertakings bring misfortune.
Nothing that would further.
001011.name: Marrying Maiden
yao_ci:
Initial Six: The marrying maiden as a concubine.
A lame man who is able to tread.
Undertakings bring good fortune.
Second Six: A one-eyed man who is able to see.
Third Nine: The marrying maiden as a slave.

Fourth Six: The marrying maiden draws out the allotted time.
A late marriage comes in due course.
Fifth Nine: The sovereign I gave his daughter in marriage.
Top Nine: The woman holds the basket, but there are no fruits in it.

001100.gua_ci:
PREPONDERANCE OF THE SMALL. Success.
Perseverance furthers.
Small things may be done; great things should not be done.
The flying bird brings the message:
It is not well to strive upward,
It is well to remain below.
Great good fortune.
Exceptional modesty and conscientiousness are sure to be rewarded with success; however, if a man is not to throw himself away, it is important that they should not become empty form and subservience but be combined always with a correct dignity in personal behavior. We must understand the demands of the time in order to find the necessary offset for its deficiencies and damages. In any event we must not count on great success, since the requisite strength is lacking. In this lies the importance of the message that one should not strive after lofty things but hold to lowly things. The structure of the hexagram gives rise to the idea that this message is brought by a bird. In Ta Kuo, PREPONDERANCE OF THE GREAT
001100.name: Little Exceeding
yao_ci: Initial Six: The bird meets with misfortune through flying.

Second Six: She passes by her ancestor
And meets her ancestress.
He does not reach his prince
And meets the official.
Third Nine: If one is not extremely careful,

Fourth Nine: No blame. He meets him without passing by.
Going brings danger. One must be on guard.
Do not act. Be constantly persevering.
Fifth Six: Dense clouds,
Top Six: He passes him by, not meeting him.

001101.gua_ci:
ABUNDANCE has success.
The king attains abundance.
Be not sad.
Be like the sun at midday.
001101.name: Abundance
yao_ci: Initial Six: When a man meets his destined ruler,
Second Six: The curtain is of such fullness
Third Nine: The underbrush is of such abundance
Fourth Nine: The curtain is of such fullness

Fifth Six: Lines are coming,
Blessing and fame draw near.
Good fortune.

Top Nine: His house is in a state of abundance.
He screens off his family.
He peers through the gate
And no longer perceives anyone.
For three years he sees nothing.
Misfortune.

001110.gua_ci:
DURATION. Success. No blame.
Perseverance furthers.
It furthers one to have somewhere to go.
001110.name: Long Lasting
yao_ci: Initial Six: Seeking duration too hastily brings misfortune persistently.
Second Six: Remorse disappears.

Third Nine: He who does not give duration to his character
Meets with disgrace.
Persistent humiliation.
Fourth Nine: No game in the field.
Fifth Nine: Giving duration to one's character through perseverance.
Top Six: Restlessness as an enduring condition brings misfortune.

001111.gua_ci: THE POWER OF THE GREAT. Perseverance furthers.
001111.name: Great Strength
yao_ci:
Initial Six: Power in the toes.
Continuing brings misfortune.
Second Six: Perseverance brings good fortune.
Third Nine: The inferior man works through power.

Fourth Nine: Perseverance brings good fortune.
Remorse disappears.
Fifth Nine: Loses the goat with ease.

Top Nine: A goat butts against a hedge.
It cannot go backward, it cannot go forward.

010000.gua_ci:
HOLDING TOGETHER brings good fortune.
Inquire of the oracle once again
Whether you possess sublimity, constancy, and perseverance;
Then there is no blame.
Those who are uncertain gradually join.
Whoever come too late
Meets with misfortune.
010000.name: Union
yao_ci:
Initial Six: Hold to him in truth and loyalty;
This is without blame.
Truth, like a full earthen bowl"
Thus in the end
Good fortune comes from without.

Second Nine: Hold to him inwardly.
Perseverance brings good fortune.
Third Six: You hold together with the wrong people.

Fourth Six: Hold to him outwardly also.
Perseverance brings good fortune.

Fifth Six: Manifestation of holding together.
In the hunt the king uses beaters on three sides only
And forgoes game that runs off in front.
The citizens need no warning.
Good fortune.

Top Six: He finds no head for holding together.
Misfortune.

010001.gua_ci:
DIFFICULTY AT THE BEGINNING works supreme success,
Furthering through perseverance.
Nothing should be undertaken.
It furthers one to appoint helpers.
010001.name: Beginning
yao_ci:
Initial Six: Hesitation and hindrance.
It furthers one to remain persevering.
It furthers one to appoint helpers.

Second Nine: Difficulties pile up.
Horse and wagon part.
He is not a robber;
He wants to woo when the time comes.
The maiden is chaste,
She does not pledge herself.
Ten years--then she pledges herself.

Third Six: Whoever hunts deer without the forester
Only loses his way in the forest.
The superior man understands the signs of the time
And prefers to desist.
To go on brings humiliation.

Fourth Six: Horse and wagon part.
Strive for union.
To go brings good fortune.
Everything acts to further.

Fifth Six: Difficulties in blessing.
A little perseverance brings good fortune.
Great perseverance brings misfortune.

Top Nine: Horse and wagon part.
Bloody tears flow.

010010.gua_ci:
The Abysmal repeated.
If you are sincere, you have success in your heart,
And whatever you do succeeds.
010010.name: Darkness
yao_ci:
Initial Six: Repetition of the Abysmal.
In the abyss one falls into a pit.
Misfortune.

Second Nine: The abyss is dangerous.
One should strive to attain small things only.

Third Six: Forward and backward, abyss on abyss.
In danger like this, pause at first and wait,
Otherwise you will fall into a pit in the abyss.
Do not act this way.

Fourth Six: A jug of wine, a bowl of rice with it;
Earthen vessels

Fifth Nine: The abyss is not filled to overflowing,
It is filled only to the rim.
Top Six: Bound with cords and ropes,

010011.gua_ci:
LIMITATION. Success.
Galling limitation must not be persevered in.
010011.name: Restricting
yao_ci:
Initial Six: Not going out of the door and the courtyard
Is without blame.

Second Nine: Not going out of the gate and the courtyard
Brings misfortune.

Third Six: He who knows limitation
Will have cause to lament.
Fourth Six: Contented limitation. Success.

Fifth Nine: Sweet limitation brings good fortune.
Going brings esteem.

Top Nine: Galling limitation.
Perseverance brings misfortune.
Remorse disappears.

010100.gua_ci:
OBSTRUCTION. The southwest furthers.
The northeast does not further.
It furthers one to see the great man.
Perseverance brings good fortune.
010100.name: Hardship
yao_ci:
Initial Six: Going leads to obstructions,
Coming meets with praise.

Second Nine: The King's servant is beset by obstruction upon obstruction,
But it is not his own fault.

Third Six: Going leads to obstructions;
Hence he comes back.

Fourth Nine: Going leads to obstructions,
Coming leads to union.

Fifth Six: In the midst of the greatest obstructions,
Friends come.

Top Six: Going leads to obstructions,
Coming leads to great good fortune.
It furthers one to see the great man.

010101.gua_ci:
AFTER COMPLETION. Success in small matters.
Perseverance furthers.
At the beginning good fortune.
At the end disorder.
010101.name: Already Fulfilled
yao_ci:
Initial Six: He breaks his wheels.
He gets his tail in the water.

Third Six: The Illustrious Ancestor
Disciplines the Devil's Country.
After three years he conquers it.
Inferior people must not be employed.

Fourth Nine: The finest clothes turn to rags.
Be careful all day long.

Fifth Six: The neighbor in the east who slaughters an ox
Does not attain as much real happiness
As the neighbor in the west
With his small offering.
Top Nine: He gets his head in the water. Danger.

010110.gua_ci:
THE WELL. The town may be changed,
But the well cannot be changed.
It neither decreases nor increases.
They come and go and draw from the well.
If one gets down almost to the water
And the rope does not go all the way,
Or the jug breaks, it brings misfortune.
010110.name: Replenishing
yao_ci: Initial Six: One does not drink the mud of the well.
Second Nine: At the well hole one shoots fishes.
Third Six: The well is cleaned, but no one drinks from it.
Fourth Nine: The well is being lined. No blame.

Fifth Nine: In the well there is a clear, cold spring
From which one can drink.

Top Six: One draws from the well
Without hindrance.
It is dependable.

010111.gua_ci:
WAITING. If you are sincere,
You have light and success.
Perseverance brings good fortune.
It furthers one to cross the great water.
010111.name: Needing
yao_ci:
Initial Six: Waiting in the meadow.
IT furthers one to abide in what endures.
No blame.

Second Nine: Waiting on the sand.
There is some gossip.
The end brings good fortune.

Third Six: Waiting in the mud
Brings about the arrival of the enemy.

Fourth Nine: Waiting in blood.
Get out of the pit.

Fifth Nine: Waiting at meat and drink.
Perseverance brings good fortune.

Top Nine: One falls into the pit.
Three uninvited guests arrive.
Honor them, and in the end there will be good fortune.

011000.gua_ci:
GATHERING TOGETHER. Success.
The king approaches his temple.
It furthers one to see the great man.
This brings success. Perseverance furthers.
To bring great offerings creates good fortune.
It furthers one to undertake something.
011000.name: Bringing Together
yao_ci: Initial Six: If you are sincere, but not to the end,

Second Nine: Letting oneself be drawn
Brings good fortune and remains blameless.
If one is sincere,
It furthers one to bring even a small offering.
Third Nine: Gathering together amid sighs.
Fourth Six: Great good fortune. No blame.
Fifth Six: If in gathering together one has position,
Top Six: Lamenting and sighing, floods of tears.

011001.gua_ci:
FOLLOWING has supreme success.
Perseverance furthers. No blame.
011001.name: Following
yao_ci:
Initial Six: The standard is changing.
Perseverance brings good fortune.
To go out of the door in company
Produces deeds.

Second Nine: If one clings to the little boy,
One loses the strong man.

Third Nine: If one clings to the strong man,
One loses the little boy.

Fourth Six: Following creates success.
Perseverance brings misfortune.
To go one's way with sincerity brings clarity.
How could there be blame in this?
Fifth Six: Sincere in the good. Good fortune.

Top Nine: He meets with firm allegiance
And is still further bound.
The king introduces him
To the Western Mountain.

011010.gua_ci:
OPPRESSION. Success. Perseverance.
The great man brings about good fortune.
No blame.
When one has something to say,
It is not believed.
011010.name: Exhausting
yao_ci:
Initial Six: One sits oppressed under a bare tree
And strays into a gloomy valley.
For three years one sees nothing.
Second Nine: One is oppressed while at meat and drink.

Third Nine: A man permits himself to be oppressed by stone,
And leans on thorns and thistles.
He enters the house and does not see his wife.
Misfortune.

Fourth Six: He comes very quietly, oppressed in a golden carriage.
Humiliation, but the end is reached.

Fifth Nine: His nose and feet are cut off.
Oppression at the hands of the man with the purple knee bands.
Joy comes softly.
It furthers one to make offerings and libations.

Top Six: He is oppressed by creeping vines.
He moves uncertainly and says, "Movement brings remorse."
If one feels remorse over this and makes a start,
Good fortune comes.

011011.gua_ci:
THE JOYOUS. Success.
Perseverance is favorable.
011011.name: Joyful
yao_ci: Initial Six: Contented joyousness. Good fortune.

Second Nine: Sincere joyousness. Good fortune.
Remorse disappears.
Third Nine: Coming joyousness. Misfortune.

Fourth Six: Joyousness that is weighed is not at peace.
After ridding himself of mistakes a man has joy.
Fifth Nine: Sincerity toward disintegrating influences is dangerous.
Top Nine: Seductive joyousness.

011100.gua_ci:
Influence. Success.
Perseverance furthers.
To take a maiden to wife brings good fortune.
011100.name: Mutual Influence
yao_ci: Initial Six: The influence shows itself in the big toe.

Second Nine: The influence shows itself in the calves of the legs.
Misfortune.

Third Nine: The influence shows itself in the thighs.
Holds to that which follows it.

Fourth Nine: Perseverance brings good fortune.
Remorse disappears.
If a man is agitated in mind,
And his thoughts go hither and thither,
Only those friends
On whom he fixes his conscious thoughts
Will follow.
Fifth Six: The influence shows itself in the back of the neck.
Top Six: The influence shows itself in the jaws, cheeks, and tongue.

011101.gua_ci:
REVOLUTION. On your own day
You are believed.
Supreme success,
Furthering through perseverance.
Remorse disappears.
011101.name: Abolishing The Old
yao_ci: Initial Six: Wrapped in the hide of a yellow cow.
Second Nine: When one's own day comes, one may create revolution.

Third Nine: Starting brings misfortune.
Perseverance brings danger.
When talk of revolution has gone the rounds three times,
One may commit himself,
And men will believe him.

Fourth Nine: Remorse disappears. Men believe him.
Changing the form of government brings good fortune.

Fifth Six: The great man changes like a tiger.
Even before he questions the oracle
He is believed.
Top Nine: The superior man changes like a panther.

011110.gua_ci:
PREPONDERANCE OF THE GREAT.
The ridgepole sags to the breaking point.
It furthers one to have somewhere to go.
Success.
011110.name: Great Exceeding
yao_ci: Initial Six: To spread white rushes underneath.

Second Nine: A dry poplar sprouts at the root.
An older man takes a young wife.
Everything furthers.

Third Nine: The ridgepole sags to the breaking point.
Misfortune.

Fourth Nine: The ridgepole is braced. Good fortune.
If there are ulterior motives, it is humiliating.

Fifth Nine: A withered poplar puts forth flowers.
An older woman takes a husband.

Top Six: One must go through the water.
It goes over one's head.
Misfortune. No blame.

011111.gua_ci:
BREAK-THROUGH. One must resolutely make the matter known
At the court of the king.
It must be announced truthfully. Danger.
It is necessary to notify one's own city.
It does not further to resort to arms.
It furthers one to undertake something.
011111.name: Eliminating
yao_ci:
Initial Six: Mighty in the forward-striding toes.
When one goes and is not equal to the task,
One makes a mistake.

Second Nine: A cry of alarm. Arms at evening and at night.
Fear nothing.

Third Nine: To be powerful in the cheekbones
Brings misfortune.

Fourth Nine: There is no skin on his thighs,
And walking comes hard.
If a man were to let himself be led like a sheep,
Remorse would disappear.
But if these words are heard

Fifth Nine: In dealing with weeds,
Firm resolution is necessary.
Walking in the middle
Remains free of blame.

Top Nine: No cry.
In the end misfortune comes.

100000.gua_ci:
SPLITTING APART. IT does not further one
To go anywhere.
100000.name: Falling Away
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: The leg of the bed is split.
Those who persevere are destroyed.
Misfortune.

Second Six: The bed is split at the edge.
Those who persevere are destroyed.
Misfortune.
Third Six: He splits with them. No blame.

Fourth Six: The bed is split up to the skin.
Misfortune.

Fifth Six: A shoal of fishes. Favor comes through the court ladies.
Everything acts to further.

Top Six: There is a large fruit still uneaten.
The superior man receives a carriage.
The house of the inferior man is split apart.

100001.gua_ci:
THE CORNERS OF THE MOUTH.
Perseverance brings good fortune.
Pay heed to the providing of nourishment
And to what a man seeks
To fill his own mouth with.
In bestowing care and nourishment, it is important that the right people should be taken care of and that we should attend to our own nourishment in the right way. If we wish to know what anyone is like, we have only to observe on whom he bestows his care and what sides of his own nature he cultivates and nourishes. Nature nourishes all creatures. The great man fosters and takes care of superior men, in order to take care of all men through them. Mencius says about this:
100001.name: Nourishing
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: You let your magic tortoise go,
And look at me with the corners of your mouth drooping.
Misfortune.

Second Six: Turning to the summit for nourishment,
Deviating from the path

Third Six: Turning away from nourishment.
Perseverance brings misfortune.
Do not act thus for ten years.

Fourth Six: Turning to the summit
For provision of nourishment
Brings good fortune.
Fifth Six: Turning away from the path.

Top Nine: The source of nourishment.
Awareness of danger brings good fortune.
It furthers one to cross the great water.

100010.gua_ci:
YOUTHFUL FOLLY has success.
It is not I who seek the young fool;
The young fool seeks me.
At the first oracle I inform him.
If he asks two or three times, it is importunity.
If he importunes, I give him no information.
Perseverance furthers.
100010.name: Childhood
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: To make a fool develop
It furthers one to apply discipline.
The fetters should be removed.
To go on in this way bring humiliation.

Second Six: To bear with fools in kindliness brings good fortune.
To know how to take women
Brings good fortune.
The son is capable of taking charge of the household.

Third Six: Take not a maiden who. When she sees a man of bronze,
Loses possession of herself.
Nothing furthers.
Fourth Six: Entangled folly bring humiliation.
Fifth Nine: Childlike folly brings good fortune.

Top Six: In punishing folly
It does not further one
To commit transgressions.
The only thing that furthers
Is to prevent transgressions.

100011.gua_ci:
DECREASE combined with sincerity
Brings about supreme good fortune
Without blame.
One may be persevering in this.
It furthers one to undertake something.
How is this to be carried out?
One may use two small bowls for the sacrifice.
100011.name: Decreasing
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: Going quickly when one's tasks are finished
Is without blame.
But one must reflect on how much one may decrease others.
Second Six: Perseverance furthers.
Third Six: When three people journey together,

Fourth Six: If a man deceases his faults,
It makes the other hasten to come and rejoice.
Fifth Nine: Someone does indeed increase him.
Top Nine: If one is increased without depriving other,

100100.gua_ci:
KEEPING STILL. Keeping his back still
So that he no longer feels his body.
He goes into his courtyard
And does not see his people.
No blame.
100100.name: Keeping Still
yao_ci: Initial Nine: Keeping his toes still.

Second Six: Keeping his calves still.
He cannot rescue him whom he follows.
His heart is not glad.

Third Six: Keeping his hips still.
Making his sacrum stiff.
Dangerous. The heart suffocates.
Fourth Nine: Keeping his trunk still.
Fifth Six: Keeping his jaws still.

Top Six: Noblehearted keeping still.
Good fortune.

100101.gua_ci:
GRACE has success.
In small matters
It is favorable to undertake something.
100101.name: Adorning
yao_ci: Initial Nine: He lends grace to his toes, leaves the carriage, and walks.
Second Six: Lends grace to the beard on his chin.

Third Six: Graceful and moist.
Constant perseverance brings good fortune.

Fourth Nine: Grace or simplicity?
A white horse comes as if on wings.
He is not a robber,
He will woo at the right time.

Fifth Six: Grace in the hills and gardens.
The roll of silk is meager and small.
Humiliation, but in the end good fortune.
Top Nine: Simple grace. No blame.

100110.gua_ci:
WORK ON WHAT HAS BEEN SPOILED
Has supreme success.
It furthers one to cross the great water.
Before the starting point, three days.
After the starting point, three days.
100110.name: Remedying
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: Setting right what has been spoiled by the father.
If there is a son,
No blame rests upon the departed father.
Danger. In the end good fortune.

Second Six: Setting right what has been spoiled by the mother.
One must not be too persevering.

Third Six: Setting right what has been spoiled by the father.
There will be a little remorse. No great blame.

Fourth Nine: Tolerating what has been spoiled by the father.
In continuing one sees humiliation.

Fifth Nine: Setting right what has been spoiled by the father.
One meets with praise.

Top Six: He does not serve kings and princes,
Sets himself higher goals.

100111.gua_ci:
THE TAMING POWER OF THE GREAT.
Perseverance furthers.
Not eating at home brings good fortune.
It furthers one to cross the great water.
100111.name: Great Accumulation
yao_ci: Initial Nine: Danger is at hand. It furthers one to desist.
Second Six: The axletrees are taken from the wagon.

Third Six: A good horse that follows others.
Awareness of danger,
With perseverance, furthers.
Practice chariot driving and armed defense daily.
It furthers one to have somewhere to go.

Fourth Nine: The headboard of a young bull.
Great good fortune.

Fifth Nine: The tusk of a gelded boar.
Good fortune.
Top Nine: One attains the way of heaven.

101000.gua_ci:
PROGRESS. The powerful prince
Is honored with horses in large numbers.
In a single day he is granted audience three times.
As an example of progress, this pictures a time when a powerful feudal lord rallies the other lords around the sovereign and pledges fealty and peace. The sovereign rewards him richly and invites him to a closer intimacy.
101000.name: Proceeding Forward
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: Progressing, but turned back.
Perseverance brings good fortune.
If one meets with no confidence, one should remain calm.

Second Six: Progressing, but in sorrow.
Perseverance brings good fortune.
Third Nine: All are in accord. Remorse disappears.

Fourth Six: Progress like a hamster.
Perseverance brings danger.
Fifth Six: Remorse disappears.

Top Six: Making progress with the horns is permissible
Only for the purpose of punishing one's own city.

101001.gua_ci:
BITING THROUGH has success.
It is favorable to let justice be administered.
101001.name: Eradicating
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: His feet are fastened in the stocks,
So that his toes disappear.
No blame.

Second Six: Bites through tender meat,
So that his nose disappears.
No blame.

Third Nine: Bites on old dried meat
And strikes on something poisonous.
Slight humiliation. No blame.

Fourth Six: Bites on dried gristly meat.
Receives metal arrows.
It furthers one to be mindful of difficulties
And to be persevering.
Good fortune.

Fifth Six: Bites on dried lean meat.
Receives yellow gold.
Perseveringly aware of danger.

Top Nine: His neck is fastened in the wooden cangue,
So that his ears disappear.
Misfortune.

101010.gua_ci:
BEFORE COMPLETION. Success.
But if the little fox, after nearly completing the crossing,
Gets his tail in the water,
There is nothing that would further.
101010.name: Not Yet Fulfilled
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: He gets his tail in the water.
Humiliating.

Second Six: He brakes his wheels.
Perseverance brings good fortune.

Third Nine: Before completion, attack brings misfortune.
It furthers one to cross the great water.

Fourth Six: Perseverance brings good fortune.
Remorse disappears.
Fifth Nine: Perseverance brings good fortune.

Top Six: There is drinking of wine
In genuine confidence. No blame.
But if one wets his head,
He loses it, in truth.

101011.gua_ci: OPPOSITION. In small matters, good fortune.
101011.name: Diversity
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: Remorse disappears.
If you lose your horse, do not run after it;
It will come back of its own accord.
When you see evil people,
Guard yourself against mistakes.
Second Six: One meets his lord in a narrow street.
Third Nine: One sees the wagon dragged back,

Fourth Six: Isolated through opposition,
One meets a like-minded man
With whom one can associate in good faith.
Despite the danger, no blame.
Fifth Nine: Remorse disappears.

Top Nine: Isolated through opposition,
One sees one's companion as a pig covered with dirt,
As a wagon full of devils.
First one draws a bow against him,

101100.gua_ci:
The Wanderer. Success through smallness.
Perseverance brings good fortune to the wanderer.
WHEN A man is a wanderer and stranger, he should not be gruff nor overbearing. He has no large circle of acquaintances, therefore he should not give himself airs. He must be cautious and reserved; in this way he protects himself from evil. If he is obliging toward others, he wins success.
101100.name: Travelling
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: If the wanderer busies himself with trivial things,
He draws down misfortune upon himself.

Second Six: The wanderer comes to an inn.
He has his property with him.
He wins the steadfastness of a young servant.

Third Nine: The wanderer's inn burns down.
He loses the steadfastness of his young servant.
Danger.

Fourth Nine: The wanderer rests in a shelter.
He obtains his property and an ax.
My heart is not glad.

Fifth Six: He shoots a pheasant.
It drops with the first arrow.
In the end this brings both praise and office.
Top Six: The bird's nest burns up.

101101.gua_ci:
THE CLINGING. Perseverance furthers.
It brings success.
Care of the cow brings good fortune.
101101.name: Brightness
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: The footprints run crisscross.
If one is seriously intent, no blame.
Second Six: Yellow light. Supreme good fortune.

Third Nine: In the light of the setting sun,
Men either beat the pot and sing
Or loudly bewail the approach of old age.
Misfortune.

Fourth Nine: Its coming is sudden;
It flames up, dies down, is thrown away.

Fifth Six: Tears in floods, sighing and lamenting.
Good fortune.
Top Nine: The king used him to march forth and chastise.

101110.gua_ci:
THE CALDRON. Supreme good fortune.
Success.
101110.name: Establishing The New
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: A ting with legs upturned.
Furthers removal of stagnating stuff.
One takes a concubine for the sake of her son.

Second Six: There is food in the ting.
My comrades are envious,
But they cannot harm me.
Good fortune.

Third Nine: The handle of the ting is altered.
One is impeded in his way of life.
Fourth Nine: The legs of the ting are broken.

Fifth Nine: The ting has yellow handles, golden carrying rings.
Perseverance furthers.

Top Six: The ting has rings of jade.
Great good fortune.

101111.gua_ci:
POSSESSION IN GREAT MEASURE.
Supreme success.
101111.name: Great Harvest
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: No relationship with what is harmful;
There is no blame in this.
If one remains conscious of difficulty,
One remains without blame.

Second Six: A big wagon for loading.
One may undertake something.
No blame.

Third Nine: A prince offers it to the Son of Heaven.
A petty man cannot do this.

Fourth Nine: He makes a difference
Between himself and his neighbor.
No blame.

Fifth Nine: He whose truth is accessible, yet dignified,
Has good fortune.

Top Nine: He is blessed by heaven.
Good fortune.
Nothing that does not further.

110000.gua_ci:
CONTEMPLATION. The ablution has been made,
But not yet the offering.
Full of trust they look up to him.
110000.name: Watching
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: Boy like contemplation.
For an inferior man, no blame.
For a superior man, humiliation.

Second Nine: Contemplation through the crack of the door.
Furthering for the perseverance of a woman.

Third Six: Contemplation of my life
Decides the choice
Between advance and retreat.

Fourth Six: Contemplation of the light of the kingdom.
It furthers one to exert influence as the guest of a king.

Fifth Six: Contemplation of my life.
The superior man is without blame.

Top Six: Contemplation of his life.
The superior man is without blame.

110001.gua_ci:
INCREASE. It furthers one
To undertake something.
It furthers one to cross the great water.
110001.name: Increasing
yao_ci: Initial Nine: It furthers one to accomplish great deeds.
Second Nine: Someone does indeed increase him;
Third Six: One is enriched through unfortunate events.

Fourth Six: If you walk in the middle
And report the prince,
He will follow.
It furthers one to be used
In the removal of the capital.
Fifth Six: If in truth you have a kind heart, ask not.

Top Nine: He brings increase to no one.
Indeed, someone even strikes him.
He does not keep his heart constantly steady.
Misfortune.

110010.gua_ci:
DISPERSION. Success.
The king approaches his temple.
It furthers one to cross the great water.
Perseverance furthers.
The text of this hexagram resembles that of Ts'ui, GATHERING TOGETHER
110010.name: Dispersing
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: He brings help with the strength of a horse.
Good fortune.

Second Nine: At the dissolution
He hurries to that which supports him.
Remorse disappears.
Third Six: He dissolves his self. No remorse.
Fourth Six: He dissolves his bond with his group.

Fifth Nine: His loud cries are as dissolving as sweat.
Dissolution! A king abides without blame.

Top Six: He dissolves his blood.
Departing, keeping at a distance, going out,
Is without blame.

110011.gua_ci:
INNER TRUTH. Pigs and fishes.
Good fortune.
It furthers one to cross the great water.
Perseverance furthers.
110011.name: Innermost Sincerity
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: Being prepared brings good fortune.
If there are secret designs, it is disquieting.

Second Nine: A crane calling in the shade.
Its young answers it.
I have a good goblet.
I will share it with you.
Third Six: He finds a comrade.
Fourth Six: The moon nearly at the full.
Fifth Nine: He possesses truth, which links together.

Top Nine: Cockcrow penetrating to heaven.
Perseverance brings misfortune.

110100.gua_ci:
DEVELOPMENT. The maiden
Is given in marriage.
Good fortune.
Perseverance furthers.
110100.name: Developing Gradually
yao_ci: Initial Nine: The wild goose gradually draws near the shore.

Second Nine: The wild goose gradually draws near the cliff.
Eating and drinking in peace and concord.
Good fortune.
Third Six: The wild goose gradually draws near the plateau.

Fourth Nine: The wild goose goes gradually draws near the tree.
Perhaps it will find a flat branch. No blame.

Fifth Six: The wild goose gradually draws near the summit.
For three years the woman has no child.
In the end nothing can hinder her.
Good fortune.

Top Six: The wild goose gradually draws near the clouds heights.
Its feathers can be used for the sacred dance.
Good fortune.

110101.gua_ci: THE FAMILY. The perseverance of the woman furthers.
110101.name: Household
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: Firm seclusion within the family.
Remorse disappears.
Second Nine: She should not follow her whims.
Third Six: When tempers flare up in the family,

Fourth Nine: She is the treasure of the house.
Great good fortune.

Fifth Six: As a king he approaches his family.
Fear not.
Good fortune.

Top Nine: His work commands respect.'
In the end good fortune comes.

110110.gua_ci:
THE GENTLE. Success through what is small.
It furthers one to have somewhere to go.
It furthers one to see the great man.
110110.name: Proceeding Humbly
yao_ci: Initial Nine: In advancing and in retreating,

Second Nine: Penetration under the bed.
Priests and magicians are used in great number.
Good fortune. No blame.
Third Six: Repeated penetration. Humiliation.

Fourth Nine: Remorse vanishes.
During the hunt

Fifth Nine: Perseverance brings good fortune.
Remorse vanishes.

Top Six: Penetration under the bed.
He loses his property and his ax.
Perseverance brings misfortune.

110111.gua_ci:
THE TAMING POWER OF THE SMALL
Has success.
Dense clouds, no rain from our western region.
110111.name: Little Accumulation
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: Return to the way.
How could there be blame in this?
Good fortune.

Second Nine: He allows himself to be drawn into returning.
Good fortune.

Third Six: The spokes burst out of the wagon wheels.
Man and wife roll their eyes.

Fourth Nine: If you are sincere, blood vanishes and fear gives way.
No blame.

Fifth Nine: If you are sincere and loyally attached,
You are rich in your neighbor.

Top Nine: The rain comes, there is rest.
This is due to the lasting effect of character.
Perseverance brings the woman into danger.
The moon is nearly full.
If the superior man persists,
Misfortune comes.

111000.gua_ci:
STANDSTILL. Evil people do not further
The perseverance of the superior man.
The great departs; the small approaches.
111000.name: Hindrance
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: When ribbon grass is pulled up, the sod comes with it.
Each according to his kind.
Perseverance brings good fortune and success.
Third Nine: They bear shame.

Fourth Six: He who acts at the command of the highest
Remains without blame.
Those of like mind partake of the blessing.

Fifth Six: Standstill is giving way.
Good fortune for the great man.
"What if it should fail, what if it should fail?"
In this way he ties it to a cluster of mulberry shoots.

Top Six: The standstill comes to an end.
First standstill, then good fortune.

111001.gua_ci:
INNOCENCE. Supreme success.
Perseverance furthers.
If someone is not as he should be,
He has misfortune,
And it does not further him
To undertake anything.
111001.name: Without Falsehood
yao_ci: Initial Nine: Innocent behavior brings good fortune.
Second Nine: If one does not count on the harvest while plowing,
Third Nine: Undeserved misfortune.

Fourth Six: He who can be persevering
Remains without blame.

Fifth Six: Use no medicine in an illness
Incurred through no fault of your own.
It will pass of itself.
Top Nine: Innocent action brings misfortune.

111010.gua_ci:
CONFLICT. You are sincere
And are being obstructed.
A cautious halt halfway brings good fortune.
Going through to the end brings misfortune.
It furthers one to see the great man.
It does not further one to cross the great water.
111010.name: Contention
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: If one does not perpetuate the affair,
There is a little gossip.
In the end, good fortune comes.

Second Nine: One cannot engage in conflict;
One returns home, gives way.
The people of his town,
Three hundred households,
Remain free of guilt.

Third Nine: To nourish oneself on ancient virtue induces perseverance.
Danger. In the end, good fortune comes.
If by chance you are in the service of a king,
Seek not works.

Fourth Six: One cannot engage in conflict.
One turns back and submits to fate,
Changes one's attitude,
And finds peace in perseverance.
Good fortune.

Fifth Nine: To contend before him
Brings supreme good fortune.

Top Six: Even if by chance a leather belt is bestowed on one,'
By the end of a morning
It will have been snatched away three times.

111011.gua_ci:
TREADING. Treading upon the tail of the tiger.
It does not bite the man. Success.
111011.name: Fulfillment
yao_ci: Initial Nine: Simple conduct. Progress without blame.

Second Nine: Treading a smooth, level course.
The perseverance of a dark man
Brings good fortune.

Third Nine: A one-eyed man is able to see,
A lame man is able to tread.
He treads on the tail of the tiger.

Fourth Six: He treads on the tail of the tiger.
Caution and circumspection
Lead ultimately to good fortune.

Fifth Nine: Resolute conduct.
Perseverance with awareness of danger.

Top Nine: Look to your conduct and weigh the favorable signs.
When everything is fulfilled, supreme good fortune comes.

111100.gua_ci:
RETREAT. Success.
In what is small, perseverance furthers.
111100.name: Retreat
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: At the tail in retreat. This is dangerous.
One must not wish to undertake anything.
Second Nine: he holds him fast with yellow oxhide.

Third Nine: A halted retreat
Is nerve-wracking and dangerous.

Fourth Nine: Voluntary retreat brings good fortune to the superior man
And downfall to the inferior man.
Fifth Six: Friendly retreat. Perseverance brings good fortune.
Top Six: Cheerful retreat. Everything serves to further.

111101.gua_ci:
FELLOWSHIP WITH MEN in the open.
Success.
It furthers one to cross the great water.
The perseverance of the superior man furthers.
111101.name: Seeking Harmony
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: Fellowship with men at the gate.
No blame.

Second Nine: Fellowship with men in the clan.
Humiliation.

Fourth Nine: He climbs up on his wall; he cannot attack.
Good fortune.

Fifth Six: Men bound in fellowship first weep and lament,
But afterward they laugh.
After great struggles they succeed in meeting.

Top Nine: Fellowship with men in the meadow.
No remorse.

111110.gua_ci:
COMING TO MEET. The maiden is powerful.
One should not marry such a maiden.
111110.name: Encountering
yao_ci:
Initial Nine: It must be checked with a brake of bronze.
Perseverance brings good fortune.
If one lets it take its course, one experiences misfortune.
Even a lean pig has it in him to rage around.

Second Nine: There is a fish in the tank. No blame.
Does not further guests.

Third Nine: And walking comes hard.
If one is mindful of the danger,
Fourth Nine: No fish in the tank.

Fifth Nine: A melon covered with willow leaves.
Hidden lines.

Top Six: He comes to meet with his horns.
Humiliation. No blame.

111111.gua_ci: THE CREATIVE works sublime success, Furthering through perseverance.
111111.name: Initiating
yao_ci: Initial Nine: Hidden dragon. Do not act.

Second Nine: Dragon appearing in the field.
It furthers one to see the great man.

Third Nine: All day long the superior man is creatively active.
At nightfall his mind is still beset with cares.
Danger. No blame.

Fourth Nine: Wavering flight over the depths.
No blame.

Fifth Nine: Flying dragon in the heavens.
It furthers one to see the great man.
Top Nine: Arrogant dragon will have cause to repent.
111111.yong_ci:
There appears a flight of dragons without heads.
Good fortune.

commonData.slogan: LOVE IS THE DAO, AND IN ITS DIVISIVE MANIFESTATION, WE COME TO KNOW
commonData.daoActionSlogan: DUKI in Action: Pledging 1% of Profits to Decentralized Universal Kindness Income (DUKI) as a Marketing Strategy to Spread Love for All.
commonData.daoSlogan: Love Be The Way To Make All Great Again

modals.connectDaoDescription: Connect with DAO and deep seek its meaning by paying any amount of money. The money will be used to demonstrate the concept of 'DUKI in action'. DUKI /dju:ki/ is Decentralized Universal Kindness Income For All lives.
modals.emptyInterpretationPlaceholder: You have to connect DAO to get interpretation.
modals.enlightenmentText: Reflect on this interpretation with an open mind. The I Ching speaks in metaphors that may reveal deeper enlightenment about the situation over time. Return to this reading when you need guidance.
modals.deepseekDaoErrorDescription: DeepSeek Interpretation Failed. Please try again.
modals.updateKnownStatusDeprecated: Deprecated - This divination is no longer relevant
modals.updateKnownStatusDescription: How do you judge the divination based on real-world outcomes and reflections?
modals.updateKnownStatusNotePlaceholder: Share your experience or reasoning for this verification...
modals.updateKnownStatusVerifiedCorrect: Verified Correct - The divination was proven accurate
modals.updateKnownStatusVerifiedIncorrect: Verified Incorrect - The divination was proven inaccurate
consentPoints: By using this site for divination, you affirm your intent is honest, faithful, and righteous. Otherwise, reconsider participating.
You understand that the I Ching offers no direct answers, only glimpses—like a zero-knowledge proof—gently guiding us toward the Divine Will.

This site is a proof of concept for 'DUKI in action'. It offers no guarantees about service availability, and most of your divination data is also recorded on the ZK-Chain Scroll once connected to the DAO. We make no claims about the truth or falsity of I Ching divination, as we indeed know nothing. The Unknowable remains beyond reach—there is always more unknown beyond any known unknown. We can only seek it humbly, with love.
modals.insufficientBalanceError: Insufficient balance: invest amount is 64 USDC
modals.joinAsInvestorToSupport: Join our exclusive community of investors and support the growth of KnowUnknowable.Love
investorBenefits: Share 20% of DAO revenues with other investors
Limited to 64 investors with first-come-first-serve revenue sharing
Support the vision of 'DUKI In Action' to Make All Great Again

commonData.privateDescription: The will you divine is unknown by others
commonData.publicDescription: The will you divine can be known by all
commonData.textLoveBeTheWayToKnow: Divide To Divine — Love Be The Way To Know.

voyager.copyright_notice: Most of the 116 images and 31 tracks on the Voyager Golden Record are strictly protected by copyright and cannot be shown online without obtaining licenses—a task that even NASA finds challenging. To address this, we have selected four images and seven tracks that are likely low-risk or in the public domain for demonstration. If any of these violate copyright, please notify us, and we will remove them immediately.

images.name: 13. Egypt, Red Sea, Sinai Peninsula and the Nile
24. Anatomy 7 (Heart, lungs, kidneys and main blood vessels back)
25. Anatomy 8 (Heart, lungs, kidneys and main blood vessels front)
41. Heron Island (Great Barrier Reef of Australia)
68. Old man with beard and glasses (Turkey)
69. Old man with dog and flowers
72. Sprinters (Valeriy Borzov of the U.S.S.R. in lead)
78. Underwater scene with diver and fish
82. Demonstration of licking, eating and drinking
89. House interior with artist and fire
111. Page of book (Newton, System of the World)

almWorldSlogons.desc: A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.
Individual Conduct Accountability. Tit for tat with proper forgiveness to prevent conflicts.
The Way that can be spoken is not the true Way; only by walking the path of love can it be known.

daoPageData.maxInvestorCountReached: The maximum investor limit of 64 has already been reached
daoPageData.daoEvolutionDesc: DAO evolves at most once per week and needs 100 USDC in treasury to success. Fair drop comes as a result of DAO evolution.
daoPageData.dukiDefinition: DUKI /dju:ki/: Decentralized Universal Kindness Initiative.  A DAO-based system promoting fairness and kindness in action
daoPageData.lotteryPrizeRule: the winner can claim the min of max prize and 1000 * his/her total spent
daoPageData.noInvestorPromotion: Join first to share %s of DAO revenue equally among up to 64 investors—first come, first served!

requirements.p1: Only project creators are eligible to claim

sections.target: Money to DUKIGE - We need sin first for survival and then evolve to be love
sections.title: Private Love For Creators

requirements.p1: Survival of the fittest. Nothing can skip the rule, we have to survive first and then thrive.
You can invest in the DUKI in action project.

sections.target: Money to Investors - Free Will of Goodness needs power to manifest and be useful
sections.title: Private Love For Investors

requirements.p1: As the hexagram Xun says: 'The wind follows, and the noble one carries out his commands.'

sections.target: Money to Partners - Fostering strategic collaborations and alliances
sections.title: Private Love For Contributors

requirements.p1: Influencers using their platform or service to amplify positive impact and inspire participation.
requirements.p2: Only 64 spots available. Apply offline to become an evangelist. Embrace a 'love all' marketing strategy by pledging to donate 1% of profits to humanity, distributed equally if possible, potentially via blockchain in the future like zk-kyc and so on. No donation is required if there are no profits. May your kindness-first actions warm humanity and capture all lives' attention.

sections.target: Money to Influencers - Empowering voices that awaken and mobilize all lives
sections.title: Public Love For Influencers

requirements.p1: Gathering flames into brilliance, kindling fire together
requirements.p2: Only the lucky community user who wins the lottery is eligible to claim

sections.target: Money to Pioneers - First adopters and adventurers are the pioneers of the world
sections.title: Public Love For Community

requirements.p1: To benefit all beings, one must be as vast as lakes and seas, embracing all rivers.
requirements.p2: A nation's tax revenue is essentially the love generated by commercial activity for its people. Web3 does not currently support this, but we hope to see future national-level support for ZK-KYC or ZK-ID to establish a unified WorldID.

iChingPageData.iChingAndWillAndLoveAndDNA: How I Ching, Will, Love, and DNA are related?
iChingAndWillAndLoveAndDNADetails: Love is the fundamental source of all will and drive. It operates through a dynamic mechanism of "division and union"—as exemplified by the interplay of yin and yang, or the structural duality represented by male and female DNA—constructing the generative order of all things. In this process, love functions not only as a force of union but also as a principle of differentiation, continuously partitioning and generating domains of naming within an infinite conceptual space—local fields of meaning and existence. It is through this division and union that the world unfolds and existence comes into being.

This process resembles a cosmic act of "making love": in the tension between division and unity, new will is conceived. It may manifest as the birth of life, the emergence of an idea, an invention, or a moment of transformation—each act of creation is the interweaving of love and will.

Everyday experience affirms this: all human intentions and actions are rooted in love. The object of love may vary—oneself, a partner, family, friends, strangers, nations, cultures, or even the entirety of humanity and the world. Love makes us agents of action, and also creators of meaning.

Yet the essence of love resists full comprehension through empirical or reductionist scientific frameworks. It is not an object measurable by instruments, but a force belonging to the generative realm of becoming. We can only approach it through the manifestations of will that it drives—manifestations that may take the form of collaboration or conflict, creation or destruction, forming the dynamic tapestry of reality.

Within this framework, the I Ching can be seen as a proto "zero-knowledge proof" system: it does not directly reveal the truth, but rather, through symbolic structure and patterned logic, offers insight into how a particular will might unfold within reality. This method of divination is, at its core, a reading of generative forces rather than a confirmation of static facts.

Through it all, love remains the thread—the passageway to the unknowable. It is not only the starting point for understanding the world, but also the possibility for transcending it. It exists within the sayable, and beyond the reach of language. Love is the precondition of naming, and also the excess that naming can never fully contain.
iChingPageData.iChingAndZkProofAndRandomness: I Ching, Zero-Knowledge Proof and Randomness
iChingPageData.perspectiveExplanation: This viewpoint is rooted in humanistic inquiry, extending beyond the bounds of verifiable science.
iChingPageData.prerequisite: Be honest, be faithful, and be righteous for the will.

quotes.author: I Ching - The Divide To Divine Method
quotes.quote: The number of the Great Expansion is fifty, yet only forty-nine are used. They are divided into two to symbolize the two primal forces. One is set apart to symbolize the three powers. They are counted by fours to symbolize the four seasons. The remainder is returned to the lei to symbolize the intercalary month. Since there are two intercalations in five years, the process is repeated, and then one is set apart again. Heaven is one, Earth is two; Heaven is three, Earth is four; Heaven is five, Earth is six; Heaven is seven, Earth is eight; Heaven is nine, Earth is ten. There are five heavenly numbers and five earthly numbers. The five positions correspond, each finding its complement. The sum of the heavenly numbers is twenty-five, that of the earthly numbers is thirty. Together, the numbers of Heaven and Earth make fifty-five. This is what brings about change and sets the spirits in motion.

quotes.author: I Ching - ䷃ Hexagram Meng (Youthful Folly)
quotes.quote: YOUTHFUL FOLLY has success. It is not I who seek the young fool; The young fool seeks me. At the first oracle I inform him. If he asks two or three times, it is importunity. If he importunes, I give him no information. Perseverance furthers.

zkDemo.clickAnyEdge: Click any edge to verify adjacent nodes have different colors. Colors shuffle between verifications to prevent solution discovery. Use the Reveal button to see the complete coloring (for demonstration purposes only).

comparisons.iChing: The Unknowable (possible something in scientific or religious) who knows everything or something and is willing to deliver revelations through divination
comparisons.zkDemo: Entity who knows something and is willing to prove it to the verifier without revealing the truth

comparisons.iChing: Person who is determined and also wants to glimpse the possible manifestation of the 'Will' and adapt to the change
comparisons.zkDemo: Skeptical party who wants to verify if the prover's claim is true (e.g. if the  prover indeed knows the 3-coloring scheme of the graph)

comparisons.iChing: Divination about how a 'Will' will manifest
comparisons.zkDemo: Selection of an edge to verify

comparisons.iChing: Revelation of the gua and its mutation with predefined commitment
comparisons.zkDemo: Revelation of the colors of two vertices with randomized commitment

comparisons.iChing: User verifies accuracy through actual future events
comparisons.zkDemo: Verifier checks if the two vertices have different colors and are consistent with the pre-commitment

comparisons.iChing: Correct revelations are eventually acknowledged as accurate
comparisons.zkDemo: If the prover knows the graph 3-colorable scheme, the prover always passes verification

comparisons.iChing: Incorrect revelations are discovered and rejected (in case of rejection, this still does not mean the entire I Ching is incorrect, since nobody can truly know the validity of the prerequisites or the accuracy of interpretations. The ultimate truth remains unknowable)
comparisons.zkDemo: If the graph is not 3-colorable, the Prover cannot pass verification

comparisons.iChing: User obtains only partial revelations, know nothing about the complete knowledge
comparisons.zkDemo: Verifier obtains only partial color information, not the entire scheme

zkDemo.comparisonsTitle: Comparative Analysis of i Ching Divination and Zero-Knowledge Proof
zkDemo.description: Zero-knowledge proofs permit you to convince a verifier of the truth of a fact (namely, that a graph is three colorable), without revealing the actual fact itself (three coloring of the graph). It depends on randomness to ensure the verifier cannot learn the truth from the proof.
zkDemo.title: Zero Knowledge 3-Colorability Demo

willPageData.connectToViewTips: Connect to view your divination history and insights
willPageData.diviAlgoDescription: know the unknowable, speak the unspeakable
willPageData.diviAlgoSlogan: Where Ancient Wisdom Meets Modern DAO
willPageData.diviAlgoSloganDescription: Unlock the secrets of will destiny through the power of divine guidance

diviAlgoSteps.long_description: Moving beyond representations is like seeing past the shadows on Plato's cave wall—symbols, words, speech, and all phenomena are manifestations of will. When we calmly transcend their representations, surpass their images, and open the door to the ancient wisdom of the I Ching, we can glimpse the deeper unity connecting all beings.
diviAlgoSteps.short_description: Beneath all appearances , there exists an ineffable will.
diviAlgoSteps.title: Awakening of Will

diviAlgoSteps.long_description: Every division is an exploration, a journey of the will of love being tested and evolving in the infinite space. As love divides and flows within each awakened consciousness, it gives birth to the unique light of will — diverse thoughts and individual truths. These wills intertwine and entangle between the observer and the observed, forming the invisible hand that sculpts reality.
diviAlgoSteps.short_description: Only through division can the optimal path be found in the boundless chaos.
diviAlgoSteps.title: Knowing Through Division

diviAlgoSteps.long_description: Science, technology, and all intricate systems are not the ultimate answer. They are merely tools that amplify the will of whoever wields them. When they no longer serve the all love and are used as weapons for mutual harm, they can only bring chaos in the end. However, love is different — a sincere love for all — not an empty slogan, but genuine care and empathy, which is enough to make division and unity align with the Great Way, revealing the commonality within our differences and the fundamental oneness, finally making all great again.
diviAlgoSteps.short_description: Love nurtures will — giving us direction and purpose in the world.
diviAlgoSteps.title: Walking the Path of All Love

willPageData.iChingToKnowDescription: While we often fixate on these static representations, the I Ching offers subtle guidance when consulted. Like zero-knowledge proofs, it reveals deeper, partial truths about the constantly changing will and its possible manifestations
willPageData.iChingToKnowTarget: The World as Will and Representation
willPageData.loveWillRepresentation: Love Begets Will, and Will Begets Representation

suggestions.value: Might there come a time when all lives around the world possess the freedom — the power to say no to evil — and use that power to uphold the will to protect world peace?
Let love and humility lead the way—reviving a dream as vast as Babel, to make all great again. How might the will represent itself in the time ahead?
Humankind has the will to set foot on Mars. Will it gain enough power to fully manifest before 2031?
Can MOOC educational courses become as globally viral as TikTok videos in the next decade, serving as a key force in promoting educational equity?
I am actively looking for a new job, preferably in the Web3 space. How will this idea unfold in the future?

suffix_options: I want to find a new job. How is it going to manifest in the future?
I want to get a promotion. How is it going to unfold in the future?
I want to find my true love. What is going to happen in the future?

willPageData.willDiviTemplate: I want to know how [the will] is going to manifest in the future?
